New Records: Shaheen Afridi recorded 4-22 in Bangladesh's 127-8, a significant bowling performance

The match saw turning points and high-pressure moments
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam mentioned the challenging pitch conditions and their strategy
Bangladesh skipper Shakib Al Hasan discussed their target and the difficulty faced in the early overs
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan reflected on Bangladesh's performance and expressed pride in the team's effort
